mapper.insert: insert into X_topic_rate(topic_ID, user_ID, user_role, rate_type, gmt_create) VALUES (#{topicID}, #{userID}, #{userRole}, #{rateType}, #{gmtCreate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM X_topic_rate t WHERE t.topic_ID = #{topicID} AND t.user_ID = #{userID} AND t.rate_type = #{rateType} AND t.status = '1'
SELECT * FROM X_topic_rate t WHERE t.topic_ID = #{topicID} AND t.user_ID = #{userID} AND t.rate_type != '4' AND t.status = '1'
